|                           |
|   W                   W   |
|                           |
|      +-------------+      |
|      |             |      |
|      |   (inner)   |      |
|  S   |      C      |  S   |
|      |             |      |
|      +-------------+      |
|                           |
|   W    (outer)        W   |
|                           |
+---------------------------+
